Articles.Content:
So what's the popular method of generating fuel / oxidizers for the game? I've started playing with the 3M home system, but it's a beast of a ship and finding it a challenge to get it anywhere and seems to require an atmosphere in order to be productive. I've seen several threads about Kethane, but searching for the mod is proving to be a challenge. Searching the Forum and the Spaceport for Kethane only reveals discussions, no mods or guides are coming up in the searches.

I'm thinking I'd love to setup a fuel mining facility in a low gravity area, such as MinMus, and use it as a launching point for the larger ships travelling deeper in/out of the system.

What do you guys suggest? Have good links to those mods?

Here is the link for the mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/23979-Kethane-Pack-0-6-Multiple-resources-support%21-Electric-generator%21-and-more%21 The forumpage includes a link to the kethane wiki.

Searching the Forum and the Spaceport for Kethane only reveals discussions, no mods or guides are coming up in the searches.

DAMN you must be new to the internet. Over in this corner we have something called 'search engines'. They allow you to enter some keywords, and the engine will search the web for you, and bring up all sorts of relavent information.

Give it a try: http://lmgtfy.com/?q=Kethane

DAMN you must be new to the internet. Over in this corner we have something called 'search engines'. They allow you to enter some keywords, and the engine will search the web for you, and bring up all sorts of relavent information.

Give it a try: http://lmgtfy.com/?q=Kethane

Wow! Those results look exactly like what I described in my original post. Hits on discussions and questons about it. In fact, one of those results is a post asking where the mod is as all they can find are discussions. Good job on reading... let's work on comprehension.

Here is the link for the mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/23979-Kethane-Pack-0-6-Multiple-resources-support%21-Electric-generator%21-and-more%21 The forumpage includes a link to the kethane wiki.

So any other options out there other than Kethane that are popular?

Home can produce fuel in an atmosphere with electricity afaik - there is nothing else out there besides Kethane. Dev already announced a resource system, so there isn't really much drive to develop an own...

Wow! Those results look exactly like what I described in my original post. Hits on discussions and questons about it. In fact, one of those results is a post asking where the mod is as all they can find are discussions. Good job on reading... let's work on comprehension.

ahem, first result.
There was a mod called "Fueltastic", but the dev didn't upload it to the spaceport, and I think it got wiped out on the forum crash. :/

ahem, first result.

lol pwned

Wow! Those results look exactly like what I described in my original post. Hits on discussions and questons about it. In fact, one of those results is a post asking where the mod is as all they can find are discussions. Good job on reading... let's work on comprehension.

Maybe next time you should try to read the first result Google gives you.

To quote the first line of text in the first post:

This is the new home for the Kethane Pack.

That almost looks like that forum thread might be the home page of the mod.

And that big ass link saying

Download Kethane 0.6

Almost as if that might be a download link
